text: Kaley Cuoco is married and what a wedding! On Saturday night, the Big Bang Theory star wed fellow equestrian Karl Cook in a glamorous ceremony at Cook ’ s Pomponio horse ranch in Southern California. The bride wore a white sleeveless lace Reem Acra gown with a matching cape to the outdoor ceremony and a white lace plunging Tadashi Shoji jumpsuit to the reception, which was held indoors under a two - story tent and continued well into the early morning. “ Their initials were painted on the lawn, on personal fans for each guest, on the food, on little bourbon bottles for guests and on the favors, which were tequila and shot glasses, ” said of the guests. “ They had horseshoes all over the place and they walked through the stables and
